name: godoxy
tagline: A self-hosted HTTP inspection proxy for debugging web traffic
description: Godoxy is a self-hosted proxy server designed for inspecting HTTP traffic and debugging. It provides a web interface and API for logging requests, useful for development and debugging processes.

features.title: Request Logging
features.description: Capture detailed logs of all HTTP traffic passing through the proxy

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: View and analyze traffic through a browser-based dashboard

features.title: REST API
features.description: Identify issues in API calls, webhooks, and HTTP integrations

features.title: Api Testing
features.description: Test API endpoints by modifying requests before forwarding to backends

features.title: Development Workflow
features.description: Essential tool for debugging web applications and services
